FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /

Aura Of Dominance

  1. CUSTOM CARD
    Can I play this on a character with less than 11 stars?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes, you will simply not gain the second ability. The character will still gain Bold 1, Tough 1 and 2 extra HP.
  2. CUSTOM CARD
    What happens if I play this on an 11*+ character and my opponent has a card disabling my cards from scrapping Upgrades on their characters?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    They will still scrap a card from their hand, but will not have to scrap an Upgrade.
  3. CUSTOM CARD
    What happens if I play this on an 11*+ character and my opponent has a card disabling my cards from scrapping cards in their hand?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    They would still scrap an Upgrade from one of their characters, but will not have to scrap a card from their hand.
